RerUserDates.Settings: Matomo的性能更高，可从用户配置文件中删除自定义范围值，从而将其默认值设为“昨天”。 您还可以从信息中心的日历中隐藏“日期范围”字段。
RerUserDates.SettingsProfiles: Remove custom range values as default in users profiles
RerUserDates.SettingsProfilesDescription: Regular users can only choose today, yesterday, week, month ranges as default value in their profile. Users already with ranges are forced to 'yesterday'
RerUserDates.SettingsCalendars: 在日历中隐藏'日期范围'
RerUserDates.SettingsCalendarsDescription: 阻止用户在其主面板的日历上选择生成自定义范围的报告。
RerUserDates.SuperuserMessage: Regular users are forbidden to choose a ranged default value in their profile. Ranged values are forced to 'yesterday' (RerUserDates)
RerUserDates.DefaultDateMessage: Your default user setting 'range' is now 'yesterday'. You can visit user settings page to choose a different range
